Constant Field Values
Constructor Detail

IMAPServer

public IMAPServer(int port,
                  String hostname,
                  int timeout)
           throws Exception
Create a new instance of the IMAPServer class, listening on the specified port for IMAP requests. A ServerSocket is started to listen for incoming requests, which will then be dispatched to an available worker thread

Parameters:
port - integer containing the port to start the server on
hostname - the host name the server shall respond
timeout - integer containing the timout on connections in miliseconds
Throws:
Exception
Method Detail

public static boolean checkSocket()
Check if the server is running.

Returns:
boolean true if it is running.

getServerName

public static String getServerName()
Return the full server gretting string.

Returns:

Return the hostname.

Main method for IMAP server
